title: Title
name: Name
forgot_password_description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
secure_area_description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
two_factor_confirmation_desc1: Please confirm access to your account by entering the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
two_factor_confirmation_desc2: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
api_token_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this API token?
api_token_create_description: API tokens allow third-party services to authenticate with our application on your behalf.
permissions_description: Permission settings page! You can list, create, update or delete permissions here!
permissions_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Permission?
roles_description: Role settings page! Here you can list, create, update or delete the role!
roles_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Role?
manage_api_token_description: You may delete any of your existing tokens if they are no longer needed.
api_token_copy_description: Please copy your new API token. For your security, it won't be shown again.
email_verification_description: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
email_verification_description2: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided in your profile settings.
delete_account_description1: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
browser_sessions_description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
browser_sessions_description1: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
posts_description: Post settings page! Here you can list, create, update or delete the post!
users_description: User settings page! Here you can list, create, update or delete a user!
users_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this User?
users_search_placeholder: Search the user by name or email...
books_description: Open books page! Here you can list, create, update or delete a book!
books_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Book?
books_search_placeholder: Search the books by title or author...
subdomains_description: Open subdomains page! Here you can list, create, update or delete a subdomains!
subdomains_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this subdomain?
author: Author
